protocols_failed.HNT: Not indexed in Dune tokens_solana.transfers table (0 transfers in 30 days); Solscan/Birdeye/Solana RPC all rate-limited or 403. HNT likely uses non-standard SPL program after Helium L1→Solana migration.
protocols_failed.HONEY: Dune Solana query returned 0 holders (prior expansion attempt)
protocols_failed.WXM: Dune Arbitrum query returned 0 holders (prior expansion attempt)
protocols_failed.ANYONE: Dune Ethereum query returned 0 holders (prior expansion attempt)
protocols_failed.FIL: Filfox API returned 400, Spacescope returned 404. No public miner power distribution API accessible.

data_source.RENDER: Dune Analytics inline query (tokens_solana.transfers, net_transfer method)
data_source.DIMO: Dune Analytics inline query (erc20_polygon.evt_Transfer, net_transfer method) — collected in prior expansion phase
data_source.IOTX: Dune Analytics inline query (erc20_ethereum.evt_Transfer, net_transfer method) — collected in prior expansion phase
data_source.GRASS: Dune Analytics inline query (tokens_solana.transfers, net_transfer method) — collected in prior expansion phase

exclusions.cosmos_exclusions: AKT: 170 unbonded/jailed validators excluded; only BOND_STATUS_BONDED validators included

methodology: Top-1000 holders via Dune net_transfer (EVM/Solana) or Cosmos LCD staking API (AKT). Exchange hot/cold wallets excluded. Null/dead addresses excluded. Balances exceeding 2x total supply flagged as overflow. AKT uses delegated PoS validator voting power (not individual delegator balances). DIMO and IoTeX flagged as concentrated_by_design (top1 share >50%).

results_summary.claim: DePIN governance concentration (mean HHI=0.1884) exceeds DeFi benchmarks (mean HHI=0.0926)
